#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define mod 1000000
#define ll long long
ll power(ll a,ll b)
{
    if(b==0)
        return 1;
    if(b==1)
        return a;
    ll temp=power(a,b/2);
    temp=(temp*temp)%mod;
    if(b%2)
        temp=(temp*a)%mod;
    return temp;
}
int main()
{
    ll x,y;
    while(1)
    {
        scanf("%lld%lld",&x,&y);
        if((x==0)&&(y==0))
            break;
        printf("%lld\n",power(x,y));
    }
    return 0;
}
